A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had to see this movie multiple times\, double checking that it wasn't just nostalgia nor fandom that powered my enjoyment of it. Minus some pieces that honestly could of been taken out\, looking at you Casino Planet\, the movie is a great continuation and I believe set the building blocks for the next movie to be the climactic ending to a old story line we all very much need it to be to lead to new possibilities.
